title: Genesis Child Theme
description: A theme entry in the Genesis Child Theme Index

author.description: Name of the individual or company who is credited as the author of the theme

purchaseUrl.description: The URL of the page where the theme can be purchased from, or in the case of being free, downloaded from

demoUrl.description: The URL where a demo of the theme can be found

free.description: True if the theme is free, false if a premium theme

html5.description: True if the theme supports HTML5, false if it outputs XHTML instead

responsive.description: True if the theme displays well at various screen sizes, false if it is fixed width

mobileMenu.description: True if the theme displays a mobile-specific menu at small screen sizes, false if it doesn't

layouts.description: The number of layouts the theme supports (Genesis default is 6 but child theme may register or register others)

accessibilityReady.description: True if the theme meets all of the guidelines at http://make.wordpress.org/themes/guidelines/guidelines-accessibility/, false if not

customBackground.description: True if the theme supports the WordPress custom background feature, false if it doesn't

customColors.description: True if the theme allows a user to choose custom colors via an interface, false if it doesn't

editorStyle.description: True if the theme includes styles for the post editor that match the front-end, false if it doesn't

featuredImageHeader.description: True if the theme displays a featured image as a header, false if it doesn't.

grunt.description: True if the theme includes support for *grunt* to allow development tasks to be automated, false if it doesn't

postFormats.description: List of post formats the theme supports, `false` if it doesn't support any.

parallax.description: True if the theme design includes a parallax feature, false if it doesn't

psds.description: True if the theme includes PhotoShop (PSD) files of the original design, false if it doesn't

rtlLanguageSupport.description: True if the theme includes right-to-left (RTL) style sheets, false if it doesn't

starter.description: True if the theme author considers this theme to be a starter theme, false if not

translationReady.description: True if the theme has all strings internationalised, loads a child theme text domain, and includes a .pot file, false if it doesn't

browsersSupported.title: Browsers
browsersSupported.description: Key-value pairs of browser names and their minimum supported versions

pluginsSupported.description: List of plugins names that the theme explicitly includes styles for
